trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VlvRequestControl"></xref> class is used to request virtual list view (VLV) support from the server.

The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VlvRequestControl.#ctor"></xref> constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VlvRequestControl"></xref> class.

The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VlvRequestControl.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Byte[])"></xref> constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VlvRequestControl"></xref> class using the specified entry counts and target entry.
The number of entries before the target entry that the client requests from the server to return in the list results.
The number of entries after the target entry that the client requests from the server to return in the results.
The target entry for the search.

The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VlvRequestControl.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)"></xref> constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VlvRequestControl"></xref> class using the specified entry counts and offset.
The number of entries before the target entry that the client requests from the server to send back in the list results.
The number of entries after the target entry that the client requests from the server to send back in the results.
The ratio between the offset value and the content count.

The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VlvRequestControl.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String)"></xref> constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VlvRequestControl"></xref> class using the specified entry counts and target entry.
The number of entries before the target entry that the client requests from the server to return in the list results.
The number of entries after the target entry that the client requests from the server to return in the results.
The target entry for the search.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VlvRequestControl.AfterCount"></xref> property specifies the number of entries after the target entry to return in the list results.
The number of entries after the target entry to return in the list results.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VlvRequestControl.BeforeCount"></xref> property specifies the number of entries before the target entry to return in the list results.
The number of entries before the target entry to return in the list results.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VlvRequestControl.ContextId"></xref> property contains the context ID assigned by the server to identify this search operation.
The context ID assigned by the server to identify this search operation.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VlvRequestControl.EstimateCount"></xref> property contains the content count of the list.
The content count of the list.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VlvRequestControl.GetValue"></xref> method returns a BER-encoded sequence that specifies the control.
A BER-encoded sequence that specifies this control.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VlvRequestControl.Offset"></xref> property contains the offset value of the target entry.
The offset value of the target entry.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VlvRequestControl.Target"></xref> property contains the target entry of the search.
The target entry of the search.
